5 #include <ros/ros.h>
6 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
7 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
8 #include <sensor_msgs/image_encodings.h>
9 #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>
10 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
11 
12 static const std::string OPENCV_WINDOW = "Image window";
13 
14 class ImageConverter
15 {
16  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
17  image_transport::ImageTransport it_;
18  image_transport::Subscriber image_sub_;
19  image_transport::Publisher image_pub_;
20 
21 public:
22  ImageConverter()
23  : it_(nh_)
24  {
25  // Subscrive to input video feed and publish output video feed
26  image_sub_ = it_.subscribe("/camera/image", 1,
27  &ImageConverter::imageCb, this);
28  image_pub_ = it_.advertise("/image_converter/output_video", 1);
29 
30  cv::namedWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW);
31  }
32 
33  ~ImageConverter()
34  {
35  cv::destroyWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW);
36  }
37 
38  void imageCb(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
39  {
40  cv_bridge::CvImageConstPtr cv_ptr;
41  try
42  {
43  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvShare(msg, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BGR8);
44  }
45  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
46  {
47  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
48  return;
49  }
50 
51  // Draw an example circle on the video stream
52  if (cv_ptr->image.rows > 60 && cv_ptr->image.cols > 60)
53  cv::circle(cv_ptr->image, cv::Point(50, 50), 10, CV_RGB(255,0,0));
54 
55  // Update GUI Window
56  cv::imshow(OPENCV_WINDOW, cv_ptr->image);
57  cv::waitKey(3);
58 
59  // Output modified video stream
60  image_pub_.publish(cv_ptr->toImageMsg());
61  }
62 };
63 
64 int main(int argc, char** argv)
65 {
66  ros::init(argc, argv, "image_converter");
67  ImageConverter ic;
68  ros::spin();
69  return 0;
70 }
